name: Archaic Petra
title: Of Mountains Mighty: Archaic Petra
desc: "While the Millelith stands guard, evil shall never prevail!"
in_play_description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent Card: Spend 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Geo Dice.

skills.desc:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Geo Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
